# Scientist SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#cc74fc]Scientist[/color] of this station.
1. Scientists should give a warning over the Common Channel before generating an anomaly.
2. Scientists must ensure that any anomaly generated is found and monitored posthaste.
3. Scientists must ensure that anomalies never reach, or are at risk of going supercritical.
4. Scientists are obligated to remove any anomalies held within secure areas, unless permission is given by the requisite Head of Staff.
5. Scientists must ensure that radiation protection is available close to or within the Artifact chamber.
6. Scientists are to avoid any artifact effects that would result in destruction of the Artifact chamber or the greater station.
